price: 52. Taigi iš tiesų, tu (Muchammedai ﷺ) negali priversti mirusiojo girdėti (t. y. netikinčiųjų), nei gali priversti kurčiąjį išgirsti kvietimą, kai jie rodo savo nugaras ir nusigręžia.
arabic: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
